author: slive
msg: It's just too difficult keeping this stuff updated in 20 different places.
Lets make the docs/mirrors/ version the official one.

author: slive
msg: Scripts don't take kindly to ommitting the trailing slash.

author: slive
msg: It may look like I'm unilaterally changing policy here, but I believe I'm
only documenting the current state of the world.  It hasn't really been
possible to properly mirror apache websites in a long time.

author: slive
msg: Do an update on the ftp side of the mirrors list.

author: slive
msg: Get rid of non-functional mirrors.  Any mirror that didn't have httpd-2.0.36
was trashed, but most of these are simply completely dead.
